name: setOnFocus
Activity Transaction
spec: Override Pending Animaton Close Animaton%m.anim Enter Animaton %m.anim

name: Activity Transaction 0-1
spec: Override Pending Transaction Close Animaton is 0 Open Animaton %m.anim

name: Activity Transaction 1-0
spec: Override Pending Transaction Enter Animation %m.anim Close Animaton is 0

name: Recyclerview SetNotifyItemChanged
spec: %m.recyclerview set Notify Item Inserted at position %d

name: Recyclerview LinearLaManager
spec: %m.recyclerview LinearLaManager Name %s.inputOnly  at %m.activity Stack From End %b

name: Blur Image
